## Code I strongly believe scientists must share code and data. I'm a member of NumFOCUS (open code, better science), I agree with [Lorena Barba](http://lorenabarba.com/gallery/reproducibility-pi-manifesto/), and I endorse the [science code manifesto](http://sciencecodemanifesto.org). Check out my repositories on [github](https://github.com/crocha700) and the links on my publication list. [mysite]: http://www-pord.ucsd.edu/~crocha [usp]: http://www.usp.br [umass]: http://www.umassd.edu [scripps]: http://www.scripps.ucsd.edu
